thread.title: Ad-Technology Company, Underground Elephant Named Region's Largest Private Marketing Company by San Diego Business Journal
thread.title_full: Ad-Technology Company, Underground Elephant Named Region's Largest Private Marketing Company by San Diego Business Journal

title: Ad-Technology Company, Underground Elephant Named Region's Largest Private Marketing Company by San Diego Business Journal
text:
Ad-Technology Company, Underground Elephant Named Region's Largest Private Marketing Company by San Diego Business Journal October 14, 2015 05:34 ET | Source: Underground Elephant 
SAN DIEGO, Calif., Oct. 14, 2015 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- via PRWEB - As the country's emerging leader in real-time advertising technology and Fortune-100 SaaS marketing solutions, Underground Elephant is now the 27th largest private company in San Diego, according to the San Diego Business Journal. 
Underground Elephant climbed seven spots from its 34th-place ranking last year, and is projecting double-digit growth in 2015. This marks the 4th consecutive year that this self-funded company has ranked on the list. 
This is the 12th edition of the San Diego Business Journal's Largest Private Companies List, and this year's list honors privately-held companies that demonstrate the highest annual revenue figures in 2014. 
Commenting on the achievement, Jason Kulpa, Founder and CEO of Underground Elephant, said, "I'd like to thank the San Diego Business Journal for recognizing the accomplishments of local businesses. San Diego is a rich place for innovation and growth, and we are happy to be a part of the city's continued, rapid evolution." 
About Underground Elephant 
Founded in 2008 and headquartered in Downtown San Diego, Underground Elephant is an award-winning technology company that develops programmatic advertising platforms in order to bring transparency and efficiency to the buying and selling of structured lead generation media. The company's robust portfolio of enterprise-grade tech solutions enhances the connection between enterprises and their prospective clients by delivering a highly efficient route to organic sales conversations. 
This article was originally distributed on PRWeb. For the original version including any supplementary images or video, visit http://www.prweb.com/releases/2015/10/prweb13021350.htm Underground Elephant Jarrod Russell +1 (619) 269-3032 Related Articles other press releases by Underground Elephant
